jobTitle: Programmer Analyst - Patient Financial Services ( DATA SYS ANL 3)
jobDescription: Programmer Analyst - Patient Financial Services ( DATA SYS ANL 3)  San Francisco Medical Center  Full Time  salary commensurate with experience  Category:  Information Technology  Requisition: 16028  Posting Date: 5/31/2018The Data Systems Analyst 3 position is primarily responsible for completing project based requests in the form of custom reports and analysis for the EDI Operations Manager, the systems and Operations Assistant Director and external requests from outside departments.
